actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Making dire emergency supplemental appropriations to meet needs resulting from severe floods in the Southeast, including Alabama, Georgia, Mississippi, Tennessee and Louisiana, and other natural disasters for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1990, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes dire emergency supplemental appropriations for FY 1990 to: (1) the Department of Agriculture to meet emergency needs of the Soil Conservation Service and the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service resulting from flooding; (2) the Department of Defense-Civil to meet emergency needs for flood control and coastal emergencies; and (3) the Federal Emergency Management Agency to meet the needs of Mississippi resulting from flooding.

titles.title: Making dire emergency supplemental appropriations to meet needs resulting from severe floods in the Southeast, including Alabama, Georgia, Mississippi, Tennessee and Louisiana, and other natural disasters for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1990, and for other purposes.
